alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; East Cameron; Evangeline; Lafayette; Lower St. Martin; Northern Acadia; Southern Acadia; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 31 at 2:49PM CDT until August 31 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM UNTIL 8 PM FOR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS ACROSS ALL OF SOUTHEAST TEXAS AND MUCH OF SOUTHWEST AND CENTRAL LOUISIANA... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND VERY DRY FUELS FOR ALL OF SOUTHWEST LOUISIANA... * AFFECTED AREA...Avoyelles, Evangeline, St. Landry, Lafayette, Upper St. Martin, Lower St. Martin, West Cameron, East Cameron, Northern Acadia, Upper Vermilion, Upper Iberia, Upper St. Mary and Southern Acadia. * TIMING...10 AM until 8 PM Thursday. * WINDS...Northeast 5 to 10 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the lower 90s. * LIGHTNING...None. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Burn bans are in effect across Louisiana and Southeast Texas.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Avoyelles; East Cameron; Evangeline; Lafayette; Lower St. Martin; Northern Acadia; Southern Acadia; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion; West Cameron
